description: Students continue to develop basic language skills with emphasis on expanding vocabulary and on writing assignments that aid in the practical application of grammatical concepts. Communicating in German about familiar personal topics, students acquire vocabulary about sports, food, holidays, school, the environment, and life in German speaking cultures. Offered annually in the spring semester. Does not count toward German major or concentration. Prerequisite: GERM 111 or by placement test.
name: Beginning German II
notes: Prerequisite: GERM 111 or by placement test.
